data.oai_dc:dc: Catch from 2012 and 2016 from a pontoon trap equipped with two different types of Seal Exclusion Devices. Each caught fish was weighed individually at every harvest occasion. Total catch, number of harvest occasions, Catch Per Unit Effort (CPUE) - total numbers of fish per soak day in one trap and Weight Per Unit Effort (WPUE)- weight of the catch per soak day in one trap, can be calculated from this data.
Seal exclusion|pontoon trap|grey seal|mitigating conflict fishers vs seals|coastal fisheries
